text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Roy Cooper cares for North Carolinians and wants to keep as many safe as possible. It was a wise decision on his part, considering the present circumstances of increased Covid19 cases. Trump on the other hand only cares about himself, his image and his re-election. Not Americans
